com.devclue.grouper.stem
Class StemAdd

java.lang.Object

public class StemAdd
extends java.lang.Object

Add stems to the Groups Registry.

Constructor Detail

StemAdd

public StemAdd()
Create a new StemAdd object. 
 StemAdd nsa = new StemAdd();

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Add stem or root stem depending upon command line arguments.

Stem is printed to STDOUT if created.

Exits with 0 if stem created, 1 otherwise.

 // Create a root stem with the extension com.
 % java com.devclue.grouper.stem.StemAdd com
 
 // Create a stem with extension example within stem 
 // com.
 % java com.devclue.grouper.stem.StemAdd com example

addRootStem

public edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.Stem addRootStem(java.lang.String extension)
Add a root stem. 

 // Create a root stem with the extension com.
 StemAdd nsa = new StemAdd();
 try {
   Stem ns = nsa.addRootStem("com");
 } 
 catch (RuntimeException e) {
   // Stem not created
 }

Parameters:
extension - Create root stem with this extension.
Returns:
Created stem.

addStem

public edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.Stem addStem(java.lang.String stem,
                                                     java.lang.String extension)
Add a stem. 
 // Create a stem with the extension example within the stem
 // com.
 StemAdd nsa = new StemAdd();
 try {
   Stem ns = nsa.addStem("com", "example");
 } 
 catch (RuntimeException e) {
   // Stem not created
 }

Parameters:
stem - Create stem within this stem.
extension - Create stem with this extension.
Returns:
Created stem.
